title: Oddworld: New 'n' Tasty - Official Video Game Soundtrack
description:
Composed, mixed and mastered by Michael Bross, the soundtrack comes in a full-coloured gatefold sleeve with RuptureFarms art by Raymond Swanland. The vinyl includes an exclusive two-sided A2 poster and a free Steam Code to download the complete game Oddworld: New â€˜nâ€™ Tasty for Mac, Windows or Linux. Additionally the Steam Code enables you to download the remastered Oddworld: New â€˜nâ€™ Tasty and the original 90s Oddworld: Abeâ€™s Oddysee soundtrack as MP3s.

It was a long way from Abeâ€™s debut in the 1997s Playstation One classic Oddworld: Abeâ€™s Oddysee to the beautiful ground-up remake Oddworld: New â€˜nâ€™ Tasty in 2014 but Abe is still looking great. Not only the graphics but also the complete video game soundtrack got an overall makeover - in 2015 Oddworld looks and sounds better than ever before. With over 10 million Oddworld games sold in almost two decades, Oddworld Inhabitants is still known for its iconic characters, its unique black humor and for its amazing and odd stories.

- Composed, mastered and mixed by Michael Bross
- Original Abeâ€™s Oddysee soundtrack by Josh Gabriel & Ellen Meijers
- Gatefold RuptureFarms art by Raymond Swanland
- Includes an exclusive two-sided A2 poster with official Oddworld art
- Includes Steam Code for Oddworld: New 'n' Tasty the game, and MP3 soundtracks for Oddworld: New 'n' Tasty and Oddworld: Abe's Oddysee.
